abstract: There is more than one way to look at HSBC‘s decision to buy 24 ad pages in this week’s New York magazine, making it the largest single-issue advertiser in the magazine’s history, The New York Times’s Douglas Quenqua writes.
lead_paragraph: There is more than one way to look at HSBC‘s decision to buy 24 ad pages in this week’s New York magazine, making it the largest single-issue advertiser in the magazine’s history, The New York Times’s Douglas Quenqua writes.

headline.main: HSBC Sponsors Entire Issue of New York Magazine
